name: Free road
description: This is a puzzle game, where you need to pave the way for a car. To put the road, you must select the desired one and drag it to the empty block. To remove the road, you need to tap on it. At the moment, the game has 45 levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 10 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 10 MB available space
